data.title: Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal – Denver International Airport
data.meta_description: Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal operates its flights from Concourse C of Terminal East Gates: C: 23-37, 40-47, 49 at Denver Airport.
data.meta_site_name: Get All Information Related to Airports Terminal Now
data.text:
There are various services that passengers can avail of at Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal at Denver International Airport. The services and amenities that passengers can utilize include baggage allowance, flight status updates, on-board entertainment, food and drink options, additional assistance, pet travel, and managing reservations. Before a flight, there are a lot of things that passengers need to think about and keep in mind.

The information in this section is specific to the Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal at Denver International Airport; you can use it to contact the airline’s office or to get ready for the flight that is scheduled to take off or land at Denver International Airport.

Introduction to Denver International Airport

Denver International Airport is a well-known international airport located in Denver, Colorado, United States. It is the most extensive airfield in the Western United States in terms of surface area. It is also the second-largest airport in the United States. With a distance of 16,600 feet (4.88 km), the airport is regarded as the longest runway for public use in North America and the seventh longest globally.

Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal Overview

Alternatively, travelers can use the Southwest Airlines website and mobile application to independently reserve tickets.

Airport Name Denver International Airport Denver Airport Address 8500 Peña Blvd, Denver, CO 80249, United States Southwest Arrival Terminal Denver Terminal East, Main Terminal Building Southwest Denver Terminal Departure Terminal East, Main Terminal Building Southwest Airlines IATA Code WN Southwest Airlines ICAO Code SWA Southwest Ticket Counter Hours 24 hours a day Country United States City Denver Southwest Terminal Denver Contact No 1 (800) 435-9792 Southwest Airlines Official Website www.southwest.com Southwest YouTube Page www.youtube.com/@Southwest Southwest Twitter Page twitter.com/SouthwestAir Southwest Facebook Page www.facebook.com/SouthwestAir Southwest Instagram Page www.instagram.com/southwestair

Visit Southwest Airlines BOS Terminal

What terminal at Denver Airport Uses Southwest Airlines?

Among the biggest airports is Denver International Airport. It is home to only one terminal, known by the name of “Jeppesen Terminal”. It is divided into two parts: East and West. When a passenger exits at the terminal’s main building, three concourses, A, B, and C, are located just outside the building.

Terminal East is where Southwest arrivals and departures occur at Denver International Airport. Southwest Airlines operates its flights from a single East terminal, Concourse C at Denver International Airport. Operating from a single terminal ensures a smooth process for passengers.

Southwest Airlines Arrival Terminal at Denver Airport

Southwest Airlines only operates domestic flights from Denver International Airport. That’s why arriving at the DIA, you will disembark from East Terminal Concourse C regardless of their destination. After deboarding your plane, locate the baggage claim area. You will find the baggage claim area in the same concourse C to fetch your checked baggage at the airport.

Southwest Airlines Departure Terminal at Denver Airport

Southwest Airlines operates its terminal departure from East terminal, Concourse C for all its domestic flights. Passengers do not have to switch their domestic connections when flying from the Denver International Airport, Denver. You can also head for the check-in counter at Concourse C of the terminal East. Here, passengers can conveniently check-in for their flights, confirm their flight details, and claim the checked baggage from the baggage claim areas at the airport.

Terminal Southwest Offers at Denver Airport

This office at the Southwest Airlines terminal DEN Airport can be reached to inquire about the following services:

Ticket Booking and Cancellation

Missing / Delayed / Lost Luggage

Baggage Allowance

Airport / Online / Self-service Kiosk Check-in

Flight Information / Flight Status

Delayed / Cancelled Flights

Airport Lounges / Facilities

Airport Transfers

Boarding Class Enquiries

Unaccompanied Minor Service

Animal Relief Area

Duty-Free Allowance

Valet Parking

In-Flight Meals / Entertainment

Southwest Airlines Denver Terminal Services

1. Booking Southwest Airlines Tickets at DEN Terminal

Anyone who wants to make reservations for flights with the airline can reach out to staff in the Southwest Terminal Denver Airport office The representatives of the airline have been trained and possess the necessary equipment to make itineraries upon request.

Moreover, passengers can reserve tickets on their own via Southwest Airlines’ website and mobile application. Southwest Airlines’ mobile app and website.

2. Manage Booking at DEN Terminal

Occasionally, travelers need to make adjustments to their reservations or include extra luxuries or services linked to their flight in their itinerary. Customers have two options: they can contact the staff at the Southwest Airlines terminal office at DEN Airport and request assistance, or they can manage their reservations independently using the airline’s mobile app or website.

3. Southwest Airlines Cancellation / Refund

Reservations may be canceled up to ten minutes before the departure of the flight. Customers will receive a refund in their original payment method for cancellations of reservations made under the Business Select and Anytime fare types. If Wanna Get Away+ and Wanna Get Away fare type reservations are cancelled, customers are refunded via credit card that can be used to purchase a flight(s) on an earlier date.

Note: The reservations and cancellations made through the official airline channels are accepted at the DEN Southwest Airlines terminal office.

4. Check-in at Southwest Airlines DEN Terminal

Travelers using Southwest Airlines (SWA) can make reservations in person at Southwest Airlines terminal DEN Airport, or they can check in online, via mobile, or on the airline’s phone number.

Check-in is available 24 hours a day up to one hour before the aircraft departs on the airline’s mobile and web applications. An hour prior to the departure time of the flight, the counter at the airport is open.

5. Southwest Airlines Flight Status

Travelers can use the airline’s mobile application or website, www.southwest.com/air/flight-status, to independently track their flight status by getting in touch with the Southwest Airlines DEN terminal office.

6. Lost and Delayed Baggage

If you notice any delayed, damaged or lost baggage, contact the representative of the airline in the baggage claim or the baggage service desk and make the incident with. The staff at the Southwest Airlines terminal office at DEN Airport can provide you with more information.

7. Southwest Airlines DEN Airport Pets Travel

The airline provides pet travel during domestic travel in the United States of America; pet(s) or animal companion(s) cannot be taken to or from Hawaii to or from other states of the USA.

SWA flights enable taking pet(s) or animal companion(s) to or from Hawaii and neighboring islands. The Denver International Airport Southwest Terminal is available for other information related to the pet travel service and to make reservations for pet travel.

8. Inflight Entertainment by Southwest Airlines

Passengers at Denver Airport’s Southwest Terminal have access to an entertainment portal featuring a selection of movies, TV series, music, and more. With the help of this website, travelers can amuse themselves during the journey. Southwest Airlines terminal DEN office can answer all questions related to entertainment in the flight.

9. Southwest Airlines Airport Lounge

Travelers will have to make use of Denver International Airport’s other services and amenities as Southwest does not provide lounges at any of the airports. Ask any member of the Southwest Airlines DEN terminal staff if you have any questions or concerns.

10. Car Rental Service at DEN Airport

The official site of the airport offers various car rental options to explore, or you can ask the airport’s staff for more information or assistance. Car rental options can be explored on the official site of the airport, or additional information or assistance can be requested from the airport’s staff.

Conclusion

We assume you are aware of terminal East is used by Southwest Airlines at DEN Airport. Moreover, both departures and arrivals are handled by Southwest at Terminal East, the Jeppesen Terminal Main Terminal building. To assist travelers with their travel planning, this blog includes further information about the airline, its services, and its operations.
